title: Liphatech Hires Business Director
text:
Charles Passantino to lead Liphatech pest management division. September 18, 2015 MILWAUKEE – Liphatech announces the addition of Charles “Charlie” Passantino as business director of the pest management division. He will fill the role previously held by Manny Martinez who is now CEO of the organization. Charlie will manage the overall operation of Liphatech’s pest management division business unit. With over 20 years of experience that includes sales, marketing and management for various organizations, he most recently worked with Vetoquinol USA in the animal health industry. “I look forward to working with Charlie and building on the success we’ve seen in the pest management division,” said Manny Martinez, CEO. “It’s exciting to add someone to our team with the experience and leadership Charlie brings.” Passantino earned a Bachelor’s degree from California State University, San Jose and is nearing the completion of his MBA from the University of Texas in Arlington. For more information about Liphatech products and services, visit www.liphatech.com or call 888-331-7900. Bayer, EnviroPest Partner to Treat Non-Profit Hearts & Horses September 18, 2015
